doc.field: Series XXIII: Pride and Progress / The Right Stuff
Series XXIII: Pride and Progress / The Right Stuff
[1]--Pride and Progress, Episode No. 45 [2]--The Right Stuff[Air Date: 11/3/1987]
[1]--Pride and Progress, Episode No. 45 [2]--The Right Stuff[Air Date: 11/3/1987]

Pride and ProgressNews-highlights:1. Gay Week in Review, with Andy Humm, Jim Levin, Joyce Hunter and special guest Harvey Fierstein, sponsored by the Human Rights Campaign Fund2.Discussion about Senator Jesse Helms who attacked educational comics from the Gay Men's Heatlh CrisisCOMMERCIAL: San Francisco AIDS Foundation3.Discussion about Randy Shilts book, "And the Band Played On"COMMERCIAL:Human Rights Campaign Fund4.Discussion about PBS's show, "AIDS Changing the Rules" hosted by President Regan's son, Ronald Regan Jr.5.News Watch, Provincton, MA town crier has been asked to resign because of homophobic remarks6.AIDS Drugs Assistance program7.David Engel, actor in "La Cage Aux Follies" sues Worthington's photography company for not including him and his partner Eric Underwood in their alumni memory book8.Gay Community Calendar, announcements about upcoming events9.GCN Sports, Front Runners Benefit Run, Announcements about Pool matches, Gay Indoor Soccer League, Gynmist,Tim Daggett, broke his leg10.Lavender Health, Interview with Michael Shernoff from Chelsea Psychotherapy Associates11.Closing Credits
The Right Stuff:1.Show Bitz, Interview with Will Sheffer from the play, "Fortune in Men's Eyes"COMMERCIAL:The Monster2."Short Bits of Wisdom From Daddy" by Perry Brass3.Interview with Bill Kunkel from Village Pointe CondosCOMMERCIAL:San Francisco AIDS Foundation4.Part 2 of Rosa von Praunheim's interview with Craig Russell from the film, "Too Outrageous"COMMERCIAL:Gay Treasures5.Closing Credits
[1]--Pride and Progress, Episode No. 45 [2]--The Right Stuff[Air Date: 11/3/1987]: November 1987
